text: Cheltondale is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is located in Region E of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==History== The suburb is situated on part of an old Witwatersrand farm called Klipfontein. It was established in 1951 and was named after the developer, H. Dare's hometown Cheltondale, Gloucestershire. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region E
title: Cheltondale
